name: SPARKCELL
description:
(DEMO) SPARKCELL

(This game is almost finished)

- THIS IS THE DEMO VERSION THAT CAN CHANGE

- WASD or ARROW KEYS to move

- Click to use the sword when in range of an enemy  

- Click to shoot bow when not in range of an enemy

Things to note

- The levels are randomly generated

-bosses will be added eventually

-shop might be added

Credits: 

- Sawsquarenoise for music

- zapsplat for some sfx

- chiptone for some sfx

-most of the game is made by alps88 but I am just making the demo into a real game
